sentences.english: This comes from a plague that was spreading in 590 A.
sentences.chinese: 這源於公元590年意大利的一場瘟疫。

sentences.english: As they work to stop the plague from spreading, Tarrou and Dr. Rieux become good friends.
sentences.chinese: 塔魯和李歐醫生也在合力阻止瘟疫擴散中結爲好友。

sentences.english: He was carried away by the plague.
A shepherd lost the whole of his flock by a dreadful illness .
sentences.chinese: 由於一場可怕的瘟疫，牧羊人的一羣羊都死光了。

sentences.english: Even those men that did bring up the evil report upon the land, died by the plague before the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 這些報惡信的人都遭瘟疫，死在耶和華面前。

sentences.english: And the power to stop the rain, turn water to blood and strike the earth with plagues.
sentences.chinese: 他們有能力叫天不下雨，把水變血和降瘟疫在地上。

sentences.english: After he s revived he tells Galvatron what happened.
sentences.chinese: 瘟疫被弄醒後告訴了驚破天事情的經過。

sentences.english: Ebon Plaguebringer now grants 3% crit at all times.
sentences.chinese: 瘟疫使者現在恆定增加3%的暴擊率。

sentences.english: Inoculating breeding gooses with gosling plague bacterin is the most economical and effective way to prevent gosling plague.
sentences.chinese: 種鵝接種小鵝瘟疫苗，是預防本病的最經濟有效途徑。

sentences.english: The plague is discovered in Alterac by Jaina and Arthas.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾薩斯與珍娜發現奧特蘭克的瘟疫。

sentences.english: People's dissatisfaction will continue to accumulate and spread like an epidemic in the community.
sentences.chinese: 民怨會不斷加劇，並像瘟疫一樣蔓延開去。

sentences.english: Seal off the city from all outside contact to stop the spread of the plague.
sentences.chinese: 封城，隔絕此城與外界的接觸，以避免瘟疫的擴散。

sentences.english: So according to the source critical analysis, no source contains ten plagues.
sentences.chinese: 所以，通過材料批評分析，沒有材料包括十次瘟疫。

sentences.english: Water woes plague regions around the world.
sentences.chinese: 水危機瘟疫地區遍佈世界各地。

sentences.english: A terrible plague hit the whole Europe.
sentences.chinese: 一場可怕的瘟疫襲擊了整個歐洲。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
